body.p: I suppose you will copy the foregoing into your Indent: please do so verbatim; as a serious misunderstanding took place— either through the copier here, or the person who looks after those things at “home”— in an indent sent to England in ___ ___ 38, (?) I ordered— “1500 lower case g’s”— and, after waiting until the Box arrived, I found to my chagrin and surprise, that they had sent “1500 q’s”!! a Letter not in use.—
